name: course_resources
schema: CREATE TABLE "course_resources" (`course` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `description` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `id` TEXT PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT ('r'||lower(hex(randomblob(7)))) NOT NULL, `resource_type` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `sort_order` NUMERIC DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, `title` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `url` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL)
